mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID, USER_NAME, USER_EMAIL, USER_BIRTH, USER_SEX, USER_REGDATE, USER_AGREEMENT, USER_OUT, USER_BLACK, USER_ROLE, USER_POINT FROM CON_USER WHERE USER_ID LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR USER_NAME LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR USER_EMAIL LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR USER_BIRTH LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR USER_SEX LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR USER_REGDATE LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR USER_AGREEMENT LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR USER_OUT LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR USER_BLACK LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR USER_ROLE LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR USER_POINT LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
